main event: An object smaller than a dime, reddish in color, was observed moving up and down and sideways in Longview, Washington on August 17, 1956.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 48 minutes and involved 2 civilians and 1 military observer, An aircraft circled the object twice without approaching it, The object was described as round and its movements were erratic, The conclusion mentioned that it was probably aircraft or balloon, No photographs were taken or present in the report.
sighted object: a reddish round object smaller than a dime
